#### <s class="topic-title">[[MDD]]</s>

*`=this.file.aliases`*

A psychiatric illness that is based on the presence of multiple criteria described by the [[DSM]]-V for a period of two weeks or longer.
^[[[notes - Diagnosing depression]]]
